biotools.summary: UCSCXenaTools is an R package for accessing genomics data from UCSC Xena platform, from cancer multi-omics to single-cell RNA-seq. Public omics data from UCSC Xena are supported through multiple turn-key Xena Hubs, which are a collection of UCSC-hosted public databases such as TCGA, ICGC, TARGET, GTEx, CCLE, and others. Databases are normalized so they can be combined, linked, filtered, explored and downloaded.
